duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise administrative staff and manage office supplies, vendors, and relationships with building management.
Oversee payroll processes, liaise with accounting, and monitor budget for office expenses and team activities.
Plan and execute team events, workshops, and morale-boosting activities. Foster a positive and inclusive company culture.
Assist with recruiting, HR interviewing, and onboarding. Manage employee benefits, healthcare, and retirement plans. Handle employee concerns, providing support and guidance.
Maintain compliance with all local, state, and federal regulations. Prepare regular reports on office efficiency, employee satisfaction, etc.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Office Management, HR, or a similar field (Master's preferred)
